WRITING.TITLE: not suicidal, but would rather be dead.

WRITING.TEXT: my life is okay at the moment but my head is still constantly throwing bad thoughts at me. i feel like a piece of shit constantly even though i know I'm not (as a friend). i used to be super suicidal but i don't remember what happened, i but just remember bein fine again. but i still kept that same mindset. i still believe that if I was dead it wouldn't matter that much, and that no one cares about me. even though, i also know that's not true for at least one person. she's the reason i'm not actually dead right now. what's troubling you, my friend?

what's not worth the wait? i just feel like such and inconvenience to everyone around me, i see literally no excuses to why that's not true. i hurt myself, really bad. it wouldn't be "that bad" to certain people, but compared to everyone i've ever met including people close to me, it's abnormal. i find anyway to self destruct. i want to die so much it literally doesn't affect me anymore. i don't even feel sad, it's just a normal thing now. honestly, i just think I'm super stressed out and hormonal right now, but i still kept the mindset from when i had my last depressive episode. it never got better, i literally just got better at repressing and ignoring it.
the little smile between kisses and everything is just perfect for that split second
what would the world be like without politics?
i was eating and a silverfish fell out of the hole in the roof. i also saw one of the cooks spank one of the waitresses.
i didn't feel angry though. it just happened

WRITING.TITLE: uhhhh, yeah. definitely might attempt soon.

WRITING.TEXT: no point to life anymore. gonna die anyway honestly. everyone will get over it out of the 1 person who will truly care, if they even do.
sometimes i just hit myself in the head over and over and until i feel dizzy.
